e="preserve">Ivan Sergeyevich Bortnik (; 16 April 1939 – 4 January 2019) was a Soviet and Russian actor. He was a People's Artist of Russia (2000). He was born in Moscow. He was known for his roles in "Family Relations", "Mirror for a Hero" and in "Mama Don't Cry".
Bortnik died on 4 January 2019 in Moscow of complications from thrombosis at the age of 79.
